Advanced Reasoning
Contextual understanding and logical reasoning
Grok 3 uses smart methods to improve its thinking skills. It learns from live internet data and trains on text, code, and images. This helps it understand context and give better answers. It also uses trial-and-error learning to solve problems. Special modes like 'Think Mode' and 'Big Brain Mode' make it even better at tough tasks.

Performance in coding, mathematics, and general knowledge
Grok 3 is great at tests like MMLU, GSM8K, and HumanEval. It scores 92.7%, 89.3%, and 86.5% on these tests. Its math skills are much better now, with scores between 93% and 96%. These results show how Grok 3 handles hard tasks in many areas.
